name: part_002
file: tmp_【#ノエルのリリカルLIVE 】新たな団長を見てッ !【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [8DQWjvFBma4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: MC segment where Shirogane Noel talks about the songs performed and her outfit change.

subtitles.original: だいたいそれでいいんじゃないの
subtitles.english: Probably that's fine, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 適当だっていいんじゃないの
subtitles.english: Being casual is fine too, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 少し不安を残したほうが
subtitles.english: Leaving a bit of uncertainty

subtitles.original: 楽しく生きられるんじゃないの
subtitles.english: Might make life more enjoyable, won't it?

subtitles.original: 疲れたら寝ればいいんじゃないの
subtitles.english: If you're tired, just sleep, isn't that fine?

subtitles.original: たまには楽していいんじゃないの
subtitles.english: It's okay to take it easy sometimes, isn't it?

subtitles.original: やりたいことやるために
subtitles.english: To do what we want to do

subtitles.original: 僕らは生きているんでしょう
subtitles.english: That's why we're living, right?

subtitles.original: だいたいそれでいいんじゃないの
subtitles.english: Probably that's fine, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 失敗してもいいんじゃないの
subtitles.english: It's okay to fail, isn't it?

subtitles.original: どんなに悩んだってほら
subtitles.english: No matter how much you worry, see

subtitles.original: 結局タイミングなんじゃないの
subtitles.english: In the end, it's all about timing, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ひとつひとつ抱え込んで
subtitles.english: Carrying everything one by one

subtitles.original: いったい何をどうしたいの
subtitles.english: What on earth do you want to do?

subtitles.original: やりたいことやるために
subtitles.english: To do what you want to do

subtitles.original: 君は生まれてきたんでしょう
subtitles.english: That's why you were born, right?

subtitles.original: 完璧な生き方なんてできないから
subtitles.english: Because we can't live perfectly

subtitles.original: 完璧な生き方なんてしたくないから
subtitles.english: Because we don't want to live perfectly

subtitles.original: 不器用な 僕は不器用な
subtitles.english: Clumsy... I'm clumsy

subtitles.original: ままでいい
subtitles.english: Just as I am is fine

subtitles.original: 神様 この歌が聞こえるかい
subtitles.english: God, can you hear this song?

subtitles.original: あなたが望んでいなくても
subtitles.english: Even if you don't wish for it

subtitles.original: 僕は笑っていたいんです
subtitles.english: I want to be laughing

subtitles.original: 泣きたい時は泣きたいんです
subtitles.english: I want to cry when I want to cry

subtitles.original: いつだって自然体でいたいね
subtitles.english: I want to be myself, always

subtitles.original: 誰もが二度と戻れぬ今を
subtitles.english: The "now" that no one can ever return to

subtitles.original: きっといつか後悔するから
subtitles.english: We'll surely regret it someday

subtitles.original: 今はまだこんな気持ちで
subtitles.english: So for now, with these feelings

subtitles.original: そよ風に歩いていたっていいよね
subtitles.english: It's okay to just walk in the breeze, right?

subtitles.original: だいたいそれでいいんじゃないの
subtitles.english: Probably that's fine, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 無理はしなくていいんじゃないの
subtitles.english: You don't have to push yourself, right?

subtitles.original: 作り笑いしたってほら
subtitles.english: Even if you fake a smile, see

subtitles.original: ちっとも楽しくないでしょ
subtitles.english: It's not fun at all, is it?

subtitles.original: ひとつひとつ抱え込んで
subtitles.english: Carrying everything one by one

subtitles.original: いったい何をどうしたいの
subtitles.english: What on earth do you want to do?

subtitles.original: 誰もが100点満点の
subtitles.english: No one can give

subtitles.original: 答えなんて出せないでしょう
subtitles.english: A perfect 100-point answer, right?

subtitles.original: 完璧な生き方なんてできないから
subtitles.english: Because we can't live perfectly

subtitles.original: 完璧な生き方なんてしたくないから
subtitles.english: Because we don't want to live perfectly

subtitles.original: 不完全な 僕は不完全な
subtitles.english: Incomplete... I'm incomplete

subtitles.original: ままでいい
subtitles.english: Just as I am is fine

subtitles.original: 神様 この歌が聞こえるかい
subtitles.english: God, can you hear this song?

subtitles.original: あなたが望んでいなくても
subtitles.english: Even if you don't wish for it

subtitles.original: 僕は笑っていたいんです
subtitles.english: I want to be laughing

subtitles.original: そして今叫びたいんです
subtitles.english: And now I want to scream

subtitles.original: いつだって最後は No Logic
subtitles.english: In the end, it's always "No Logic"

subtitles.original: 僕らのこの一度きりの夢
subtitles.english: This one-time dream of ours

subtitles.original: どうせいつか終わりが来るなら
subtitles.english: If an end will come anyway

subtitles.original: 生きること辞めたい時だけ
subtitles.english: Only when you want to stop living

subtitles.original: 立ち止まって考えるくらいで
subtitles.english: Is it okay to just stop and think

subtitles.original: いいよね
subtitles.english: Right?

subtitles.original: やりたいことだけ選んで
subtitles.english: Choosing only what I want to do

subtitles.original: いらないもの切り捨てて
subtitles.english: Casting aside what I don't need

subtitles.original: 誰もがみんなそんな風に
subtitles.english: No one can possibly

subtitles.original: 歩けるわけないよね
subtitles.english: Walk that way, right?

subtitles.original: はーい、はい。えーと、聴いてくださりありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Alright, yes. Um, thank you for listening.

subtitles.original: 「No Logic」でした。
subtitles.english: That was "No Logic."

subtitles.original: その1個前はね、「ヨワネハキ」聴いていただきました。
subtitles.english: Before that, you heard "Yowanehaki."

subtitles.original: いや、結構団長「ヨワネハキ」は配信で結構歌ってるから
subtitles.english: Well, I sing "Yowanehaki" quite often in my streams,

subtitles.original: ちょっとこの曲、ライブバージョンはこんな感じかって思ってくれた団員さんいると思うけど
subtitles.english: so I think some of you knights might have thought, "Oh, so this is what the live version is like."

subtitles.original: 「No Logic」はね、たぶん初めて歌ったと思うんですけど
subtitles.english: But for "No Logic," I think it's the first time I've sung it,

subtitles.original: ちょっとすごいね、めちゃめちゃ団長好きな曲で
subtitles.english: it's a song I really, really love,

subtitles.original: なんか「人生」っていう感じがして
subtitles.english: it feels like "life" to me.

subtitles.original: いや正直ね、ライブのもっと後ろに持ってきたほうがよかったかなって
subtitles.english: Honestly, maybe I should have put it later in the live...

subtitles.original: ちょっと冒頭でちょっと人生語っちゃったなーと思いつつ
subtitles.english: Thinking I might have talked about life too much at the beginning,

subtitles.original: ま、これからね、ちょっとあれです、この通常衣装とはおさらばし
subtitles.english: well, from here on, I'll be saying goodbye to this regular outfit.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、結構歌ったり踊ったりな
subtitles.english: And then, I'll be singing and dancing...

subtitles.original: ちょっとアイドルっぽくなってこうかなと思ってますので
subtitles.english: becoming a bit more idol-like,

subtitles.original: 引き続きハッシュタグいっぱい...
subtitles.english: so please continue using the hashtag...
